short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export leads with mobile phone numbers and verified email addresses from LinkedIn and Sales Navigator

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enrich LinkedIn and LinkedIn Sales Navigator with:
📞  Mobile phone numbers
✉️  Verified email addresses

On LinkedIn, extract leads from:
👉 Your connections
👉 Comments
👉 Likes
👉 Group members
👉 Profiles
👉 Pending invites

On Sales Navigator, scrape leads from:
👉 Sales Nav searches
👉 Sales Nav saved searches
👉 Sales Nav lead lists

Key features:
✓ Powered by 20+ enrichment providers: We give you phone numbers your competitors can't find, using more than 20 top-tier data providers like RocketReach, People Data Labs and Apollo.

✓ Only pay for valid emails and mobile numbers: if we can't find a safe-to-send email, or valid mobile numbers, it's on us.

✓ Verified by Bouncer or Debounce: contact details tested by verification specialists.

✓ Data cleaning: Remove unwanted characters and standardize your lead data.

✓ Data enrichment: Enrich leads with verified contact and company info.

✓ GDPR, DPA, CCPA compliant: data is ethically and legally collected from compliant sources.

Why use Exportli?
🚀 Get cell numbers from LinkedIn
🚀 Get emails from LinkedIn
🚀 Export your LinkedIn connections
